text: Maria Dorothea Simon (; 6 August 1918 – 8 March 2022) was an Austrian sociologist, psychologist, and scholar. She was the director of the Akademie für Sozialarbeit der Stadt Wien from 1970 to 1983. After her retirement, she was a Senior Representative at the World Federation for Mental Health. Simon died on 8 March 2022 in Vienna, Austria at the age of 103. ==Related pages== *List of sociologists from Europe ==References== Category:1918 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Writers from Vienna Category:Austrian academics Category:European sociologists Category:Psychologists Category:Centenarians
